Author: x24throwaway
Text: I was like this for 3 years. I considered myself recovered, I wasn’t consciously engaging in ED behaviours, but then one day I realised I was eating 1400-1500 calories a day (maintenance for me is 2000, which I have known for a long time). I don’t know about you, but my weight was only ever on the low end of technically healthy because of it. I spoke to my therapist and doctor about it who told me I may have improved but I’d never actually recovered.
